ARABIC: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَٰبِ إِسْمَٰعِيلَ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صَادِقَ ٱلْوَعْدِ وَكَانَ رَسُولًا نَّبِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Mention Isma'il in the Book. He was true to his promise and was a Messenger and a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Commemorate Ishmael in the Book. He was true of his promise, and a messenger, a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And recite in the Book the account of Ishmael. He was ever true to his promise, and was a Messenger, a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Mention in the Book (the Quran) the story of Ishmael; he was true to his promise, a Messengers and a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And remember Ismail in the Book; he was indeed true to his promise and was a Noble Messenger, a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And mention in the Book, Isma`il. Verily, he was true to what he promised, and he was a Messenger, (and) a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And mention Ismail in the Book; surely he was truthful in (his) promise, and he was an apostle, a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And mention in the Book Ishmael; he was true to his promise, and he was a Messenger, a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And make mention in the Scripture of Ishmael. Lo! he was a keeper of his promise, and he was a messenger (of Allah), a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Tell also of Ishmael in the Book. He was true to his promise and was a messenger and a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And mention thou in the Book lsma'i; verily he was true in promise, and was apostle, prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And mention in the Book Ishmael. Indeed, he was true to his promise, and an apostle and prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Also mention in the Book (the story of) Isma'il: He was (strictly) true to what he promised, and he was a messenger (and) a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And mention in the Book (the Quran) Isma'il (Ishmael). Verily! He was true to what he promised, and he was a Messenger, (and) a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And mention in the Book, Ishmael; he too was true to his promise, a Messenger and a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And mention in the Scripture Ishmael. He was true to his promise, and was a messenger, a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And mention in the Book, Ishmael. Indeed, he was true to his promise, and he was a messenger and a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:54] And mention in the Book Ishmael. Indeed he was true to his promise — he never promised anything which he did not fulfil; he [once] waited for three days for someone whom he had promised [to meet]; or [it is said that he waited] an entire year until that person [finally] returned to the place in which he [Ishamel] was [supposed to have met the former]; and he was a messenger, to [the tribe of] Jurhum, a prophet [likewise].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And make mention in the Scripture of Ishmael) of the event of Ishmael. (Lo! he was a keeper of his promise) whenever he promised he kept his promise, (and he was a messenger (of Allah)) to his people (a prophet) informing on behalf of Allah.
